title: bhakthi koladivadE paramAtmuDu
sahitya:
bhakti koladivadE paramAtmuDu
 bhukti mukti tAnE ichu bhuvi paramAtmuDu








caraNam 1




 patina vArichebidda paramAtmuDu
 patta bayaki danamu paramAtmuDu
 patta pagadi velugu paramAtmuDu
 netta neDudanEnnuna nida paramAtmuDu


caraNam 2

 pachi pAlOni veNNa paramAtmuDu
 pachana vAsina nUvu paramAtmuDu
 pachu sEdi oragaLLu paramAtmuDu
 itcha koladi vAdu O-Ee paramAtmuDu


caraNam 3

 palukula LonitEda paramAtmuDu
 paliyindu indariki paramAtmuDu
 palimi shrI vEnkatAdri paramAtmuDu
 elami jIvula prANa mI paramAtmuDu
